Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near Loomis/74th
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, 76th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Loomis/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, 76th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Loomis/74th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
